item.title: Capacity Estimation on the fly
item.description: Capacity estimation is a crucial component of system design interviews, and it can be quite challenging if one is not adequately prepared. However, with the right approach, it is possible to accurately estimate the storage, bandwidth, and memory/cache requirements needed for a particular system. This article provides a comprehensive framework for capacity estimation, which will enable you to confidently tackle capacity-related questions during system design interviews.
